values:
I WANT TO GO TO THIS CONCERT:

January 12th @ Starland Ballroom --- Taking Back Sunday, My Chemical Romance and Coheed and Cambria.

yea....

Carly

i miss my friends. I passed up two perfectly good oppurtunities to hang out with you guys and i wish i didnt. i just feel really shitty. happy 05

carly
I just found out that Something Corporate will be playing at Rider on the 11th.. for FREE. haha. thats so cool. I mean they arent my favorite but free concerts.. hey why not?

Ok... the sleepover was fun. Haven't seen those people in a short while so it was cool to all be together again. And then we all hung out the next day, well the girls did. Woohoo. Alot of funny stuff happened especially that guy thinking we were insane for being so crazy and not drunk/high. And the me and crissy talk while everyone was playing cards.

Then Saturday night I slept over Ian's and I was soo tired I fell asleep at like 11:30. Which was kinda funny. But I got to hear him and Dave play which was pretty decent. And we talked about how AJ is going to come visit and stay there. That still amuses me. But it's actually kinda good I guess that they are friends again. Cause then AJ could come visit ALOT! woot.

Roommate drama is annoying me. I dont know what is going on now. All I know is it better be fixed soon. Or I'll be angered.

this post was pretty uninformative and such. Oh well. Carly

Ok, this is weird and confusing but lately I've been feeling really strange. Like yesterday I said to Nicole that driving has been scaring me alot lately. I don't know why, nothing has happened to me while driving. It just makes me really nervous and I don't get it. 

Then, the other day with Crissy she said something to me about Ian. And since she said it, I've been thinking about it. About how true it is. But I've also been talking to him alot again. Mainly because he is on late at night like I am. But I've been thinking about what would happen if we got back together again. I can see it being a bad thing but maybe not. Maybe it would work out differently. 

Then again, maybe not getting any sleep lately is driving me alittle cooky. 

The other thing is, I feel like I can't talk to anyone about anything thats going on anymore. It's not that I think you guys won't listen. I don't even know WHY I feel that way. I guess it's like I said before about disappointing people and changing. I don't know.

alright, thats all. Carly

Wow, today was interesting. The beach wasnt bad but everyone was alittle...upset... that it was raining and it put us all down a bit. But we managed to have some fun and found some seaglass for myk... i found blue, it was pretty!

Then we went to myk's house and everyone but me played DDR because i think that it is the devil. Or atleast that is what i am told. But instead i took a nap. I felt kind of bad about falling asleep cause thats just boring. But the couch was so incredibly comfortable.  

Then after they woke me up we went to Borders and I got the new MCR cd and a book called.. I <3 Bad Boys. woohoo. I'm still tired. Maybe just maybe i will fall asleep at a decent hour tonight.
*carly*

Tonight, tonight was a very very awesome night. Some people are just awesome. And lip rings aren't just there to look pretty... they serve a purpose. mmhmm. I just think sometimes things are too good to be true, and if thats how it feels thats usually how it winds up.

Beach tommorow with awesome people. Yay. I just don't know about getting up early. Oh well it will be all good.
*Carly*

Oh yes, driving around in a new car listening to new TBS was also greatness.

Today felt like the longest day of my life. I went to bed at like 4:30 last night and then I get a call at 6AM by a fricken DRUNK ian begging me to come pick him up and give him a ride home or he will drive home drunk and crash. So being the nice person I am I drag my ass out of bed and drive 45 minutes to go pick him up. That annoyed me. So I didnt do anything at all today. Which didnt bother me cause I didn't go back to sleep when I got home. But I talked to Scoot* all day and night practically. I don't know I really like him. We are on the same page it seems. I get to baby-sit tommorow. I'm excited to make some money finally! 

Maybe I will be able to go to sleep early tonight. I hope so.
*Carly*

People keep telling me that I have an accent. No I don't. I don't know I just think that it's weird. Maybe I just talk differently on the phone. Not that this is anything important I just thought that it was weird cause alot of people have been telling me that. Haha. *Carly*

I just feel so relieved. I just talked to Branden and we resolved all problems. I feel better now. Plus I went to the boardwalk today. That was fun. I'm in a good mood. Woohoo.
*Carly*

It amuses me how you can give so much of yourself to one person and it will mean nothing to them. You feel like they are your shoulder to cry on and then they just dissappear. Maybe they think you are using them. Maybe they are just tired of hearing you complain. 

I don't really understand what just happened in the past five minutes so maybe thats why I'm babbling about it. I feel like its my fault. 

Also- for the sleep over girls... I'm not so sure if I'm going to be in on the little plan but I would be more than happy to help you out. If it's when you guys said you wanted to have it at the movies AJ wouldnt be able to come that early and there really isnt anyone else I would want to bring. 

And- sorry crissy about what we did to you.

I just feel like I need closure from everything and everyone.

Carly

haha i figured it out. Here is a sampling of AJ.

flying aj

i think this is the crissy picture

rocking out.. i think this is from halloween

and then some of ian with normal hair and not so normal hair

sort of multi-colored hair ian

blonde-ish hair ian

black hair ian
I hate my brain. I dont want to think about you anymore. Why can't I ever sleep?

Last night was fun except my hand is slightly red from crissy's hair. Everyone's hair looked awesome though so its all good. The park was fun too but it made me miss AJ and a few other select people. But that's ok. Thinking about that stuff makes me realize things that I didnt see before. Which is a big help.

I have to tell a few people something but I'm so afraid to tell them. I think the reason that I've been wanting to tell them is because only 2 people know and one of them is Ian, who I try not to talk to and then the other is my mom. And I don't feel like I can talk to her anymore either. And this issue has been bothering me alot lately, and I just don't know what to do about it. I'm not entirely sure on who I can trust to confide in right now on this. I don't know maybe I just wont tell anyone.

my new sn is thefirststarout

just to let you know

so if you want to reach me thats the place to look.

Wow, I haven't written in forever. But, I'm back now! I've actually been busy.. which I never am. But I have been. And boys are awesome. Well at least for this week I will be saying that. 

I'm going out with Joe now. And it's fun. I actually enjoy having a boyfriend for once. Well, it's only been like a week haha. But still, we get along really well. But he is going away for 11 days :( That is going to be horrible. But atleast he is not moving away like SOME people. lol. But yea. I saw Zoolander for the first time yesterday, it was a great movie. 

Oh yea, I had orientation for college. That was fricken awesome. It is gonna be crazy next year. Every person I met was great. I have early classes but I can deal with that. My classes are great too though. I just can't wait. Plus I get to move out. There were alot of hot guys too.. haha. We had fun though.

Some people still get on my nerves. Just grow up, come on you are 18. Get over yourself, seriously.

*Carly*

'It seems like I can finally
Rest my head on something real
I like the way that feels'

uhh.. surprise surprise, AJ left today. I don't even really remember what happened since monday. It was all just so much so fast. I don't understand. And it was so short of a time. I miss it already and Im so sad. It's not like crying is going to change anything right now anyway. 

Even though I've been around him the whole time he was here I've been so lonely. Maybe it's just me but I just don't get the whole being happy feeling anymore. I guess there is just something wrong with me. I couldn't wait for summer to come, but I forgot how much school got me out of the house. I can't wait till I move out for college, I can't stand it here. 

I don't know, I never knew to start with. 
*carly*

i went to the beach yesterday, and got sunburned. But it's gone! I was all excited about that.

Last night was weird, I don't know. I think I'm in this weird position where I want something but at the same time it almost grosses me out. Like I have a good time with him, but he's older and I don't get it. I don't think that we are on the same level.

Graduation parties today, I dont really feel like going. I guess that's mean but I'm so tired. I've been up till 5 everynight, project graduation messed up my sleep schedule. Now I feel like I'm a vampire or something.  Good thing that it's summer.

Oh I just came up with this line last night, I don't really have anything to use it for but I like it... "I want to fall asleep in your arms, your breath gently dancing across my face"

I have to go get ready *Carly*

Graduation is tomorrow. What the hell is that? It's so unreal. I guess after tomorrow night it will finally set in. Freedom is almost our-- what are we planning on doing with it? I am excited for project graduation, it better be fun.

Joe gave me the title for this entry. I like it. But I wish life was just a tad bit sweeter these days in all aspects. But I'm not going on that tangent today. I have energy and will be up all night. And then all night tomorrow night. And then the next night possibly. Too bad I don't have anyone to spend my energy on!

hmm.. our yearbooks are red. Why? I don't get it. That's really really dumb. 

I don't know.
*Carly*

"All the pain I thought I knew
All the thoughts lead back to you 
Back to what was never said
Back and forth inside my head
I can't handle this confusion
I'm unable, come and take me away"

How to make a dark_wolfess
Ingredients:
5 parts competetiveness
5 parts brilliance
5 parts empathy
Method:
Stir together in a glass tumbler with a salted rim. Add wisdom to taste! Do not overindulge!

Username:

Personality cocktail
From Go-Quiz.com

Tonight was fun, I enjoy girls night out. Park hopping is my new favorite sport (of course it has to be with Crissy, Nicole and Phyllis though).  I think I had the most crazy lines for the one line story (acting like bunnies and such).  The possum thingy was freaky and you guys were kind of scaring me.  But regardless, it was fun. 

Graduation is in 5 days, 3 more of which are school days. I am terrified, honestly. My emotions have been on a rollercoaster from this, I don't like it. But soon it will be over and forgotten and summer will wash away the memories.

I have alot of useless energy at one in the morning. Oh well. *Carly*

*P.S. --it was starry too!! yay!

"I know I can't come near you 
Every time I do 
I get shaken inside and the sun in my eyes 
So I'll stay away

I'd rather be here 
Than anywhere with you"

It seems like everytime I come to the same conclusion. I can't live like this. I mean I know I'm a piece of crap, an emotional piece of crap at that... but if I stay like this I won't be able to love anymore, not anyone. I can't say that I hate Ian because I dont, I just hate being hurt. I thought I could take it cause even though I don't seem it I am a pretty strong person or atleast act that way. I used to hate acting like I was happy but now it just happens naturally, I could be exploding from the inside and I would look like I was the happiest person in the world, and I could be.

Tonight was interesting, just got my mind off of Ian alot. Being around people of course helps. I met 2 new people too. Mike and Melissa. They were nice people. They made me have fun. And of course hanging out with Crissy is always fun. (FEEL BETTER CRISSY- I <3 YOU)

I wanted to look at the stars, but it was cloudy. Stupid clouds got in my way. Next time I'm outside it better be clear and extremely starry. And I got this song im my head 'the stars aren't out tonight, but neither are we to look up at them, why does hello feel like goodbye?'

AJ-- I know you understand but I still feel bad, and when it all boils down, you only lust me. The girls up there are alot better cause you dont want this shit. 

I dont know, im in emotional-overdrive... looks like I'm not getting too much sleep tonight. I just think that I actually like my decision and will stick to it (if I don't someone better flip on me) Yea. *carly*   

"The sadness comes when it's least expected,
it's shot out of the dark straight into our face.
The hurt it brings can't be stopped,
The hurt it brings can't be cured. "

I woke up to my cold sheets and the smell of New Jersey  
              When do I get to wake up to you?

"see your soul, it's kind of grey,
You see my heart, you look away,
You see my wrists, I know your pain"

This week hasn't been too good, well the begining was ok but then it went really wrong. Sorry to anyone I have been ignoring I just have been in a state. AJ I'm sorry, I hope that your not mad at me anymore. Tomorrow is Friday and Senior Skip Day, hopefully...it wont rain. Yesterday was senior awards.. I got a scholarship from the funeral home, how exciteful. Oh well... Carly

I think I have bad car karma, people are going to start to get afraid of driving me around. First me and Ian got in an accident awhile back and then last night I was driving with Ryan and we got in an accident. It was his (our) fault cause we went through the light just as it turned red but the other one shouldn't have turned green so quickly, there is usually alittle bit of a delay.  I didn't get hurt this time though being that we got hit in the back, but i do have a really bad headache cause i hit my head on the door, and they said I blacked out for like a minute which is no big deal.

I just generally didn't feel good today at all though. I don't know, my stomach hurt really bad and my head of course. Alot of people have like the flu and stuff at my school too though, so I might be getting sick in general. Plus I was so tired cause I didn't get home till like 2:00 and then I had to get up and be at school by 7:50 cause I can't afford to miss first period, plus we had a test that was going to count double today, just great. I think i did horribly on that.

I keep having these aweful nightmares and I don't know why. They are just really strange and I wake up about 1000 times so I am getting no sleep. I probably look like the walking dead, at least that's how I feel. I don't know. Its nothing that I can stop cause I've tried thinking 'happy thoughts', 'counting clouds' and just this relaxation thing and nothing works. I guess it's something internal that I have to figure out and deal with. 

And that's about it. *Carly*

I keep trying to get away from Ian but everytime it's just like I'm being drawn in by some force, but it's not what I want. Even though I would love to hook-up with someone right now, I don't want it to be him. And that's hard, fighting the urge to be with someone who you love (loved?). I'm one of those people that says that love never dies or goes away, if you love someone truely you can't just be like 'oh, i don't love them anymore' no matter how much you think it's true. Well, atleast that's how I feel. So anyone I've even feel in love with, I still love them, it's just that other aspects of the relationship didn't work. well, I dont know...

I kinda like someone else but not really. Well there is two people but one is turning 26 in 2 months and that's too old, for dating at least, hooking up..maybe. The other one, I don't know either, he's 16 which is no big deal really, but not really my type but I do like him alittle. I just want to occupy myself with other people right now so thats the reason or something like that.

Today, was a vow of silence thing today at school. It was good cause I didn't have to talk and also because it was just a good message. Some people were being jerks about it but most were supportive and understanding. Then at the end of the day we went outside to hear a speech and light candles. It was real sad too. And like I said it was good I didn't have to talk because then people couldn't ask me about stuff I didn't want to talk about. Cause my guidance counsler called me down yesterday to see if I was 'ok' cause some teacher supposedly thinks that there is something wrong in my life. There are alot of things but am I going to talk about them with my guidance counsler? I think not. 

Well here is a song that i like...It's Stars Hide Fire 'Fold'

The emptiness of your voice
Still Echoes clear
You warned me once again
I refused, to listen
Decided for myself
That this was everything I felt

This is all I have to give
This is what I'm living with
The hate, the games
The lies, the pain
The never knowing why
On lonely nights, I still fall asleep (fall asleep)
Without you (without you) I fold

As I sit here distorting my reality
I search hours for answers
And I can't remember
What it felt like before you
Without you I fold

I refuse to answer your questions, I won't break down
Just leave me here I can find my way, I can do this by myself

Everyday I still wake up next to you:
On lonely nights I still fall asleep (fall asleep)
Without you I fold

*Carly*

Well, last night was our prom but i didn't go. So afterwards Laura came and picked me up and me, her, jeff (her b/f) and Damian (his brother) all went to the beach. Damian is like 25 but he's crazy as hell. We went to Point Pleasant and just walked on the boardwalk and the beach and then we stayed at a hotel. They paid for it and then the guys went to get some alcohol so Laura told me about all the 'drama' at the prom. Sounds like it was pretty crazy.Then I got home about 4:00 today and did nothing really. 

But tommorow me and Laura are going to Great Adventure I think... I can't wait cause I haven't been there in a while. Friday I'm going to Dorney Park for school. yay.

So.. thats it.. there are like 10 more full days of school or something like that. I didn't go on Friday cause.. i did other things :)  I talked to Ian on the phone but I really think I am getting over him ALOT. Which is a good thing, i think. Oh well...sounds good to me.  *Carly*

I had a wierd day yesterday... I went to Ian's but we hung out with all these very 'unique' people who I've never met. I'm talking girls and guys with mohawks (some with real tall ones at that) and crazy piercings and tattoos. Very very interesting, they were alot of fun though. I figured they would be. I didn't really even talk to Ian that much. All of them were really fun and awesome too. It was fun regardless.

Today I had an AP test and then a bunch of us went to the mall. It was fun but I am extremely poor so I didn't buy anything at all. Then my dad was mad at me when I got home cause I said I would be home at 12 but got home after 3... like it really matters. But I almost hit someone, that was smart of me.

Back to Ian-- I'm not attracted to him anymore I dont think, which is a huge help. I have no desire to be with him, I guess I'm just finally realizing that I'd rather be alone then to be treated like I'm nothing, cause thats no fun at all.

Oh yea, I was talking to AJ last night and then I kinda met someone named Kiran... he's interesting.. I don't know. He seems cool and such but of course I just met him yesterday so I'll have to see if that will turn into something. Ya never know.

I can't WAIT to go the beach, I'm excited. It's almost summer so yay. And that's all *Carly*

today was busy and no ian today..hm. AJ wants me to come for a visit, i just might.  I finally got my Jet CD, i love it. Also Juliana Theory and Cursive... they are good too. Today was hopefully the last blood test, this was the big one and no blood would come out! But they finally got it so that was good. Also had AP Comp. Sci. test today, not bad. Umm.. oh yea and an interview, i was nervous cause the guy was kinda hot and stuff. Oh well. I'm done *Carly*

"and ill give you gentle kisses on the neck, and when you fall asleep in my arms ill stay up all night to make sure you stay warm" Why can't you always be like this? Why does it have to be a game from day to day to figure out your mood, to figure out what you want? Why can't you just love me or hate me and leave it at that? I hate all of the in between but I can't live without the times when things are good. What am I to do? 

People keep bugging me to go to the prom but.. i dont want to. It's just that I don't like to dance so really what is the point. No I won't regret not going, I have other memories plus high school wasn't my favorite place so it's no big deal to me. Oh well.

This summer should be interesting, only like 23 more full days of school! I can't wait... ok I'm done *Carly*

I have to go for more blood tests tomm... i don't feel like being stuck with another needle. I mean it doesn't bother me really but after a while it's like.. go away with that.

Hopefully this will be one of the last times I have to go because that would be good.

I'm still on and off with Ian again, we aren't anything but we are hanging out again and the like. That is until Crissy hooks me up with a guy ;) or AJ moves back or something of that sort. 

School is almost over which is yayness... I can't wait for summer. It's rained for the past two days which kinda sucks but I like it sometimes so I don't know. Well.. that's about all I have to say. *Carly*

Dream To Make Believe 
by Armor For Sleep 

It's funny how, Things work out
The ones we need, don't know we're there
If I were sand, and you were oceans
The moon would be, why you're pulled to me

I wake asking, Dreams are real?
I sleep so I don't have to feel,
The truth that you can never be
The one person that won't ever forget me.

I hope that dreams, come when I die
So we can talk, I won't wake up
I'll ask you how, your life worked out,
I'll never know, that I'm just dreaming.

I wake hoping,  and think Dreams are real.
I sleep so I don't have to feel,
The truth that you can never be
The one person that won't ever forget me.

Let me sleep some more (12x)
---

That is a good song.. i like it.. i like them in general-- thanks Jeff! 

This week will be hell being that we had no school last week and now back to a FULL week. But just this week and next week and then every other week I have atleast one day that I don't have to be in school! Which is awesome. My mood is strange today and I've been talking about some people about like the stuff i've been through so I guess that's why. I'm like happy and sad at the same time, yes it is possible.

I walked through the park for a long time today. It is like major stress relief. And right now I really don't have anywhere to go because no more running to Ian. He called today.. it was wierd and pointless and I wasnt really even listening. i have to forget him because I do so I will. And that's about it.So I'm done. *Carly*

comment if you want to.. if not then dont lol

Went with some friends to medieval times today... it was fun. It was good too because having a good time always gets your mind off the bad things so I was cheery. :) But I am wide awake now cause they give you alot of pepsi so yea. I made a decision about the whole even being friends w/ Ian thing but I don't know if I like my decision...oh well. I think I'll just avoid him for now. Friends are funner to hang out w/ anyway... especially at Freehold Mall lol. But yea that's all I have to write.. tommorow is the end of spring break well I have to go back monday I mean... so yuck. Oh well-I'm done. *Carly*

From aj_rocksout

I want everyone who reads this to ask me 3 questions, no more no less. Ask me anything you want.

Then, I want you to go to your journal, copy and paste this allowing your friends (including myself) to ask you anything!

As I always seem to say-- I don't know. It's hard to be with someone and then know it's right to be without them after a long time of on and off. It's like your being pulled at and ripped from the inside and it is no fun. Today was ok but I pretty much wanted to cry the entire time. It's like I can't be friends with him and I just can't bear to be more than friends because it hurts so bad. As they say seeing is believing and actually seeing evidence of what had happened made it more real and much worse than finding out by words. So I will continue to be clueless and confused until I either move on or forgive him, one will eventually happen... I hope. I just hate being sad. And I hate being alone. If I am with him atleast I am not alone. Its also hard knowing that if he has gone to others for pleasure I must be doing something wrong. That sucks. Even though he said that's not it. I am just ugly I pressume. So why does he want me back? So he can have me and other girls all at once? I think he enjoys knowing I cry over him. I don't know. I'm done thinking. *Carly*

Well, going to see Ian today, hmm. Going to the mall to 'talk' and then I don't know what else. I will be good and fair and listen. I don't know. Everyone is telling me it's stupid but I'm going to be stupid then I guess. I got my hair-cut for anyone that didn't see it. I like it, it's VERY short but it's fun and I might dye it i don't know what yet though. I had a really bad back spasm today and I couldn't stand up for like an hour I had to lay down, that wasn't fun. But I went shopping today and that was fun cause I got some retail therapy. I don't usually wear skirts but I found 2 I love especially the one so I will wear it. Spring break is here and I havn't done much but hey atleast I get sleep. Yet I'm up till 3 in the morning. Oh well, that's all for now. If anyone wants to hang out call me.

Again I STILL need a job.

Today was hell to wake up to after having off yesterday but now just one more day to spring break! My physics teacher decided to be an ass and say that we are going to do a lab on the thursday they took back for spring break but I'm still not going that day. Oh well. My grades were aweful this marking period but again, oh well.

I bought some new CDs today cause I went shopping w/ Maria and Heather after school. Heather is visiting from Washington state so that's why we all went out. I got: Brand New-'Deja Entendu' ; The Cure- 'Greatest Hits' (so I actually know what Tony is talking about ;) ) and Bright Eyes- 'Fevers and Mirrors' which I wanted forever but couldnt find but then they had ONE copy at Best Buy and I snatched it. Then I think the guy at the checkout was trying to flirt w/ me cause there is a mirror on the front of the CD and he was talking to me about it and about Bright Eyes for about 15 minutes! (There really was no one in the store) But he was very cute so that was cool and then of course Heather made fun of me for flirting with him lol. Oh well, I like boys I can't help it!

Today was well, a 'forget about everything and pretend to be happy' day, which was fine by me.  My sister came home so I complained to her for awhile and that made me feel slightly better and i miss talking to her so it was good to see her.  I just cant wait to not have to go to high school anymore because it is way too early and I am just done with that place.  

I STILL need a job, even though it's been less than a week I can't sit around anymore.  I've gone from being super busy and not knowing what to do first, to having absolutely NOTHING to do. I really hate Ian and I just wish that he would stop calling no matter how much it hurts to ignore his calls I can ignore most of them.  Just as long as I don't have to see him I will be ok, i swear. 

I just don't understand what is so bad about just being with me, I'm not a horrible person or anything like that, I'm just me and it bothers me that he says 'i love you' and still can go right ahead and crush me. I don't want to rant about him though because it will just make me sadder and want to go back to him so I will stop.

I have some people that I have to call and catch up with anyway so I will get to that, tommorow maybe.  I don't know, I will think about it tommorow, day by day I wil figure this out.  I can't wait to move out of my house and meet some 'different' people. 

Alright I am all finished for tonight.. -*Carly*-
